title: Big Dogs? No Problem! - Private Backyard & NO Pet Fees!
posting_body: No Problem! - Private Backyard & NO Pet Fees!
This beautiful NEW 3 bedroom home is Move-In ready and ALL pets are welcome!
NO additional fees or deposits for your furry friend.
We have fully enclosed your private yard for your pet to run free.
Say goodbye to annoying fees, rent increases and moving!
Let us show you how affordable homeownership can be.
Homes shown by appointment only, please call us to book your tour at
If responding by email, please provide your contact information and a link to the post you are inquiring about.
*P & I. Price $354,900, 5.625% Fixed/6.723% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
